history.proof: intros P a HinPolySet. induction P. - inversion HinPolySet. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) FPset := fun _ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => list (poly A0 eqA ltM) : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Set Co := lexprod (list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) FPset (RO A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os) Fl : {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> Prop a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Heq : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) P0 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) IHP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) P -> exists b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b P /\\ pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "Term A n" with "exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) Heq p) H = a0".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply IHP in HinPolySet as [b [Hinb Heq]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p P -> exists b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b P /\\ p = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b" on hypothesis of type "poly A0 eqA ltM".

original: intros P a HinPolySet. induction P. - inversion HinPolySet. - destruct HinPolySet as [Heq | HinPolySet]. + exists a0. split. left. apply Heq. symmetry. apply s2p_morphism. + apply IHP in HinPolySet as [b [Hinb Heq]]. exists b. split. right. apply Hinb. apply Heq.
